long_description: Ideal for adventure races, backpacking and ultralight mountaineering, the NEMO Quantum Elite 2 tent has a simple internal pole setup and it packs down smaller than a climbing helmet. Single-wall shell is made from OSMO(TM) Elite waterproof nylon fabric to keep you protected from harsh conditions. A large, internally deployable overhead vent and volumizing side vents work in combination with the featherweight OSMO fabric to transport moisture outside the tent. Quantum Elite 2 tent uses DAC Featherlite(R) poles for more strength with less weight. Durable floor is made from tough polyurethane-coated nylon ripstop. Use the vestibule outside the main entrance to store your muddy shoes, prepare food and organize gear for the next day's big push. Includes dry-bag stuff sack, stakes, guylines, repair kit and setup instructions. Average minimum weight specification is based on tent, rainfly (if applicable) and poles only. Closeout.
short_description: Ideal for adventure races, backpacking and ultralight mountaineering, the NEMO Quantum Elite 2 tent has a simple internal pole setup and it packs down smaller than a climbing helmet.
